name: Christopher L. ANTHONY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and the Department of Corrections, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Anthony v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Christopher L. ANTHONY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and the Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of June, 2011, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

Christopher L. ANTHONY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE and the Department of Corrections, Appellees.
